mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TstProject p WHERE p.id = #{id}

SELECT * FROM TstProjectAccessHistory his JOIN TstProject prj on his.projectId = prj.id WHERE his.orgId = #{orgId} AND his.userId = #{userId} AND his.deleted != TRUE AND his.disabled != TRUE AND prj.deleted != TRUE AND prj.disabled != TRUE ORDER BY his.lastAccessTime

SELECT COUNT(prj.id) FROM TstProject prj
WHERE prj.orgId = #{orgId} AND prj.id != #{projectGroupId} AND prj.type = 'group'
AND prj.deleted != TRUE AND prj.disabled != TRUE ORDER BY prj.id

SELECT * FROM TstProject prj
WHERE prj.orgId = #{orgId} AND prj.type = 'group'
AND prj.deleted != TRUE AND prj.disabled != TRUE ORDER BY prj.id
mapper.insert:
insert into TstProject (name,descr,orgId,parentId,type, selected,selecting, deleted,disabled,createTime)
values (#{name},#{descr},#{orgId},#{parentId},#{type}, FALSE,FALSE,#{deleted},#{disabled},#{createTime})
